mapper.select: SELECT SGR_NO sgrNO, CREATE_DATE time, RECEIPT_AMOUNT amount, RECEIPT_TYPE type, STATUS status, RECEIVE_ORG sendOrg FROM WH_GOODS_RECEIPT WHERE RECEIPT_TYPE IN (1, 2, 3) AND RECEIVE_WH IN (SELECT DISTINCT wh.warehouse_code FROM WH_MANAGER wh WHERE wh.org_code = #{_parameter}) ORDER BY STATUS,CREATE_DATE DESC
